Title: Establishes a voluntary statewide newborn home nurse visitation program
Summary: Establishes a voluntary statewide newborn home nurse visitation program to provide one postpartum home visit to any family with a newborn infant within seven days of birth.
LawCode: Add ยง2529, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing a voluntary statewide newborn home nurse visitation program
